content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'D_BULK_CATEGORIA' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'SILVER')
CREATE TABLE SILVER.D_BULK_CATEGORIA
	(
	 [ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	 [NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--WITH

--	,MAXERRORS = 0
--)
--END
--GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM SILVER.D_BULK_CATEGORIA
GO
